tool.name: gmx_top_prep
tool.description: Prepares topology for use in GROMACS simulations
tool.command:
#if $tgz.is_of_type("tgz"): #set $tgz_input = 'charmm-gui.tgz' ln -s '$tgz' '$tgz_input' && #end if
tar -zxvf $tgz_input `tar -tf charmm-gui.tgz | grep -E topol.top` && tar -zxvf $tgz_input `tar -tf charmm-gui.tgz | grep -E .itp` && cd `ls -d -- */`/gromacs && grep -E -v "#include" topol.top > topol.top.tmp && cat `grep -E "#include" topol.top | sed 's/#include//' | sed 's/"//g'`>> galaxy_topol.top && cat topol.top.tmp >> galaxy_topol.top && mv galaxy_topol.top ../../ && cd ../../ && rm -r `ls -d -- */` &&
tool.help: Generates a topology file compatible with Galaxy GROMACS tools from CHARMM-GUI generated inputs.
